data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Computer hardware often refers to the physical parts of a computer and its associated devices, such as the central processing unit (CPU), random access memory (RAM), disk drives, video display terminal (VDT), keyboard, mouse, and printers. Another ____ of ____ hardware ____ the ____ equipment ____ to ____ and ____ information ____ calculating. Computer hardware usually does not include software, even though software is often stored on some kind of physical medium.
data.partBlankContent: Computer hardware often refers to the physical parts of a computer and its associated devices, such as the central processing unit (CPU), random access memory (RAM), disk drives, video display terminal (VDT), keyboard, mouse, and printers. Another defin_____ of comp____ hardware i_ the phys____ equipment requ____ to st___ and manip_____ information f__ calculating. Computer hardware usually does not include software, even though software is often stored on some kind of physical medium.
data.answer: 计算机硬件通常是指计算机及其相关设备的物理部件，如中央处理器(CPU)、随机存取存储器(RAM)、磁盘驱动器、视频显示终端(VDT)、键盘、鼠标和打印机。计算机硬件的另一个定义是存储和操作计算所需的信息的物理设备。计算机硬件通常不包括软件，尽管软件通常存储在某种物理介质上。
